originalText.text: I had an incredible experience working with Elaine! She really went above and beyond to show me the best apartment in Harlem (in my opinion) and I would not have found it without her. Truly so thankful for Elaine's hard work and follow up -- couldn't be happier!

text.text: I had an incredible experience working with Elaine! She really went above and beyond to show me the best apartment in Harlem (in my opinion) and I would not have found it without her. Truly so thankful for Elaine's hard work and follow up -- couldn't be happier!

originalText.text: I recently worked with Elaine Perry to rent an apartment in manhattan, and she was extremely professional, knowledgeable, and went above and beyond (worked through the weekend!) to help me navigate through a difficult situation. There was a miscommunication with the landlord and she not only helped advocate on my behalf, but went above and beyond in person over the weekend to help work out a solution that everyone was happy with! I would definitely recommend her and would 100% work with her again!

text.text: I recently worked with Elaine Perry to rent an apartment in manhattan, and she was extremely professional, knowledgeable, and went above and beyond (worked through the weekend!) to help me navigate through a difficult situation. There was a miscommunication with the landlord and she not only helped advocate on my behalf, but went above and beyond in person over the weekend to help work out a solution that everyone was happy with! I would definitely recommend her and would 100% work with her again!

originalText.text:
Elaine is an absolute gem. She is the first broker I have ever worked with who has maintained integrity and placed client needs/satisfaction above commission. Apartment hunting can be extremely stressful, but when you find a great broker it makes a world of difference.
Thank you Elaine for being so professional and caring throughout this entire process.

text.text:
Elaine is an absolute gem. She is the first broker I have ever worked with who has maintained integrity and placed client needs/satisfaction above commission. Apartment hunting can be extremely stressful, but when you find a great broker it makes a world of difference.
Thank you Elaine for being so professional and caring throughout this entire process.

originalText.text: Ms. Perry is an excellent broker! She was punctual, professional, and extremely knowledgeable about real-estate issues. Thanks so much, Ms. Perry, for having patience with me and relieving my anxiety!

text.text: Ms. Perry is an excellent broker! She was punctual, professional, and extremely knowledgeable about real-estate issues. Thanks so much, Ms. Perry, for having patience with me and relieving my anxiety!

originalText.text:
I've been in New York City for close to 40 years and have worked with a couple of dozen realtors in Manhattan, Queens and Brooklyn, Perry Associates and specifically Elaine Perry and Stanley Gleaton are by far the best agents I've ever had the pleasure to work with. They were amazing in helping me secure my current apartment and a commercial space I've leased in Harlem. Honest, reliable and they always have your back. I'd blindly follow their lead.

Thank you Elaine and Stanley for all your help.

Jiro Tcholakian
